a.ENT_CUST_ID, a.ENT_RES_NO, a.CUST_TYPE, a.APPLY_ENT_RES_NO, a.SUPER_ENT_RES_NO, a.ENT_CUST_NAME, a.ENT_REG_ADDR, a.BUSI_LICENSE_NO, a.BUSI_LICENSE_IMG, a.ORG_CODE_NO, a.ORG_CODE_IMG, a.TAX_NO, a.TAX_REG_IMG, a.BUILD_DATE, a.END_DATE, a.NATURE, a.LEGAL_PERSON, a.LEGAL_PERSON_ID, a.CREDENTIAL_TYPE, a.LEGAL_PERSON_PIC_FRONT, a.LEGAL_PERSON_PIC_BACK, a.COUNTRY_NO, a.PROVINCE_NO, a.CITY_NO, a.BUSI_AREA, a.ENT_EMP_NUM, a.CERTIFICATE_DEPOSIT, a.BUSINESS_SCOPE, a.INTRODUCTION, a.CONTACT_PERSON, a.CONTACT_DUTY, a.CONTACT_PHONE, a.CONTACT_ADDR, a.CONTACT_EMAIL, a.OFFICE_QQ, a.OFFICE_TEL, a.OFFICE_FAX, a.ENT_CUST_NAME_EN, a.LOGO_IMG, a.INDUSTRY, a.POST_CODE, a.WEB_SITE, a.ENSURE_INFO, a.LONGITUDE, a.LATITUDE, a.TAX_RATE, a.CONTACT_PROXY, a.HELP_AGREEMENT, a.ART_RES_TYPEST, a.MODIFY_ACOUNT, a.ENT_REG_CODE, a.ENT_REG_IMG, a.BUSI_REG_CODE, a.BUSI_REG_IMG, a.ISACTIVE, a.CREATE_DATE, a.CREATEDBY, a.UPDATE_DATE, a.UPDATEDBY, a.BUSINESS_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
from T_ENT_EXTEND where ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND ENT_RES_NO IN
'${item}'

select
from T_ENT_EXTEND where ENT_CUST_ID in ( select ENT_CUST_ID from T_ENT_STATUS where CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND IS_CLOSED_ENT = 0 )

select
from T_ENT_EXTEND a left join T_ENT_STATUS b on a.ENT_CUST_ID=b.ENT_CUST_ID where a.CITY_NO in
'${item}'
and a.CUST_TYPE = 4 and a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.IS_CLOSED_ENT = 0
select count(*) from T_ENT_EXTEND where ISACTIVE = 'Y' and ( ENT_CUST_NAME = #{0} or ENT_CUST_NAME_EN = #{0} )
select count(*) from T_ENT_EXTEND where ISACTIVE = 'Y' and ( ENT_CUST_NAME = #{0} or ENT_CUST_NAME_EN = #{0} ) and CUST_TYPE = #{1}
select count(*) from T_ENT_EXTEND where ISACTIVE = 'Y' and BUSI_LICENSE_NO = #{0}

update T_ENT_EXTEND
ENT_CUST_NAME = #{entCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_REG_ADDR = #{entRegAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_LICENSE_NO = #{busiLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_LICENSE_IMG = #{busiLicenseImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

NATURE = #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_PERSON = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_PERSON_ID = #{legalPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ENT_EMP_NUM = #{entEmpNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

BUSINESS_SCOPE = #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_QQ = #{officeQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_TEL = #{officeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_FAX = #{officeFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_CUST_NAME_EN = #{entCustNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEB_SITE = #{webSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENSURE_INFO = #{ensureInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTACT_PROXY = #{contactProxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HELP_AGREEMENT = #{helpAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ART_RES_TYPEST = #{startResType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_ACOUNT = MODIFY_ACOUNT+1,
ENT_REG_CODE = #{entRegCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENT_REG_IMG = #{entRegImg,jdbcType=CHAR},
BUSI_REG_CODE = #{busiRegCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
BUSI_REG_IMG = #{busiRegImg,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ENT_CUST_ID = #{entCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.sql: T.ENT_CUST_ID, T.ENT_RES_NO, T.ENT_CUST_NAME, T.ENT_CUST_NAME_EN, T.ENT_REG_ADDR, T.BUILD_DATE, T.CONTACT_PERSON, T.CONTACT_PHONE, T.CUST_TYPE, S.COUNT_BUY_CARDS, S.BASE_STATUS, S.IS_REALNAME_AUTH, S.OPEN_DATE, T.COUNTRY_NO, T.PROVINCE_NO, T.CITY_NO
FROM T_ENT_EXTEND T left join T_ENT_STATUS S on T.ENT_CUST_ID = S.ENT_CUST_ID WHERE 1=1
FROM T_ENT_EXTEND T left join T_ENT_STATUS S on T.ENT_CUST_ID = S.ENT_CUST_ID WHERE 1=1

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select count(t.ent_res_no) FROM T_ENT_EXTEND T, T_ENT_STATUS S WHERE T.ENT_CUST_ID = S.ENT_CUST_ID

select T.ENT_CUST_ID, T.ENT_RES_NO, T.ENT_CUST_NAME, T.ENT_CUST_NAME_EN, T.ENT_REG_ADDR, T.BUILD_DATE, T.ART_RES_TYPEST, T.BUSINESS_TYPE, T.NATURE, T.CONTACT_PERSON, T.CONTACT_PHONE, T.CUST_TYPE, S.COUNT_BUY_CARDS, S.BASE_STATUS, S.IS_REALNAME_AUTH, S.OPEN_DATE, T.COUNTRY_NO, T.PROVINCE_NO, T.CITY_NO FROM T_ENT_EXTEND T, T_ENT_STATUS S WHERE T.ENT_CUST_ID = S.ENT_CUST_ID
ORDER BY OPEN_DATE DESC
